name: Trash Football
description:
What?
Physics based 100% realistic football simulator.

How to play?
press a d j k and see what they do. Esc goes back to menu. When using touch mode the screen is divided in four sections that control the players.

Why?
Because we wanted to have a challenge. We made the core game in three hours. Also to learn the Godot engine better.

But it's soccer not football1!
It's a ball game you play with feet. Football.
